string.text: Placed at sides of the ship, provides cover and moderate protection from arrows
Crates filled with arrows and bolts to restock archers during battles.
Cotton sails have greater sail power, they are also lighter and easier to work.
Forecastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight.
Throws a heavy stone shot, very good at dealing damage to ships.
Weapons and tools to improve crew in melee combat.
Reinforced heavy ram strengthens the hull and can deal devastating blows enemy ships and demoralize their crews, at a cost of additional weight.
Protects the ship against elements, and stores small mount of additional cargo.
Throws a large fire pot, dealing large amount fire damage burning ships and sails. Very effective against crews.
Aspen light oars can be rowed faster, increasing top oar speed.
Linen sails provide higher sail power, they are also lighter and easier to work.
Aftcastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight.
Placed at sides of the ship, provides cover and excellent protection from arrows
Ash light oars can be rowed faster, increasing top oar speed.
Strengthens the hull and protects it from elements, at a cost of additional weight.
Aftcastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight. Barracks allows more troops on board.
Reinforced wavebreaker ram strengthens the hull and can deal heavy blows to enemy ships, demoralize their crews while improving speed, at a cost of aditional weight.
Light oars can be rowed faster, increasing top oar speed.
Small barrels filled with quivers and throwing weapons to restock crew during battles.
Protects the hull from elements, at a cost of additional weight.
Provides excellent protection against elements and improves ship speed, at cost of a small additonal weight.
Small barrels filled with arrows and bolts to restock archers during battles.
Throws multiple small burning stones, very effective againts crews. Fire damage can burn sails and light ships.
Heavy ram can deal devastating blows enemy ships and demoralize their crews, at a cost of additional weight.
Excellent at protecting the ship against elements, and stores small mount of additional cargo.
Throws multiple small stones, very effective againts crews.
Throws a wooden bolt, effective against crews and deals light damage to ships.
Provides excellent protection against elements, at a cost of a small additonal weight.
Aftcastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight. Improved rudder increases maneuverability.
Large crates filled with quivers and throwing weapons to restock crew during battles.
Fine honed weapons and tools to improve crew in melee combat.
Reinforced aftcastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight. Barracks allows more troops on board.
Placed at sides of the ship, provides cover and some protection from arrows
Strengthens the hull and provide excellent protection against elements, at a cost of additional weight.
Throws a heavy iron shot, excellent at dealing damage to ships.
Stores large amount of additional cargo on deck.
Oaken wide oars provide more force with each pull, improving maneuverability.
Wavebreaker ram can deal heavy blows to enemy ships, demoralize their crews while improving speed, at a cost of additional weight.
Sharpened weapons and tools to improve crew in melee combat.
Reinforced aftcastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight. Improved rudder increases maneuverability.
Stores small amount of additional cargo on deck.
Supplies crew with fire arrows, dealing fire damage to enemy ships and sails.
Throws a burning wooden bolt, effective against crews. Fire damage can burn sails and light ships.
Ram can deal damaging blows enemy ships and demoralize their crews, at a cost of additional weight.
Birch wide oars provide more force with each pull, improving maneuverability.
Reinforced forecastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight. Barracks allows more crew on board.
Large crates filled with arrows and bolts to restock archers during battles.
Forecastle protects troops and strengthens the hull, at a cost of additional weight. Barracks allows more crew on board.
Wide oars provide more force with each pull, improving maneuverability.
